Class DmsContainer

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.clearguide.DmsContainer
public class DmsContainer extends Object
Synchronized collection of ClearGuide DMS and associated data.
Author:
Michael Darter

  • Method Details

    • size

      protected int size()

    • add

      protected int add(String json) throws ParsingException
      Add JSON encoded DMS and associated data to container.
      Parameters:
      json - DMS encoded as: { "dms_name": [{...route obj...},{...}]}
      Returns:
      Number of DMS in container
      Throws:
      ParsingException

    • getStat

      public Integer getStat(String dms, int rid, int min, String mode, int ridx)
      Get the specified statistic for the specified dms.
      Parameters:
      dms - DMS to retrieve statistic for.
      rid - Route id
      min - Min statistic value from [cg] tag, 0 to ignore.
      mode - Statistic to retrieve as defined by [cg] tag or null.
      ridx - Route index, zero based.
      Returns:
      Specified statistic or null if not found
